title: What are the best rap songs currently? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll give you a couple of songs that you can listen to and see which best fits what you’re looking for: Moonlight - CalboyCrazy Story - King VonFLEXING! - Keh WolfBig Fax - Anik KhanGoat - Lil TjayMixed Personalities - YNW Melly ft Kanye WestCrushed Up - FutureThe list could go on. Most of these are new or have been seeing a level of success. Then others are already pretty much on the game. Let me know if there’s any other artists I missed that can fit into the list.

Mostly from the clash between emiway bantai and raftaar we are getting more diversified content through rap through diss tracks and fusionise content of diss track such as bohot hi zyada hard by newcomer rappers is the example of experimental rap sinario and they have grab their attention by their content through rap
